issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
This issue only happens on Galaxy Nexus (4.0.2). 
It does not happen on Droid One (2.2), HTC Sensation 4G (2.3.4), Galaxy SII (2.3.6), Nexus S(4.0.4) and Xoom (4.0.3)
Steps to reproduce:
1. Make sure Facebook app is installed on the device.
2. Run KS->Mashups->Facebook->Login/Logout
3. Click the button so the label shows "Force dialog: false"
4. Click facebook login button and type the account/password.
5. KS is forced to restart and the log shows
{code}
I/ActivityManager(  185): START {act=android.intent.action.MAIN cat=[android.intent.category.LAUNCHER] flg=0x4 cmp=com.appcelerator.kitchensink/.KitchensinkActivity (has extras)} from pid -1
W/ProcessStats(  185): Skipping unknown process pid 10780
W/ActivityManager(  185): startActivity called from non-Activity context; forcing Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK for: Intent { act=android.intent.action.MAIN cat=[android.intent.category.LAUNCHER] flg=0x4 cmp=com.appcelerator.kitchensink/.KitchensinkActivity (has extras) }
{code}
fields.summary: Android: KS is forced to restart after login facebook with force_dialog=false on Galaxy Nexus

comments.body: Resolving ticket as Invalid as there is now a new version of Kitchen Sink available and we no longer support the version which relates to this ticket.
